Summary: i sighted five orange lights in the sky on november 22 2012.they were hovering then got dim then went outit ws
divs: Sighting Detailsit was thanksgiving day nov 22 2012 at about 620-630 pm.i just got home from my sisters house and sitting at the kitchen table i saw 2 orange lights going pretty fast out the window so i got up to look and then i rushed in the livingroom to have my boyfriend come look.he looked and said here comes three more.the first 2 had stopped almost as if too wait for the other 3.then all five was just sitting there not moving then 1 by 1 they dimmed and faded out.if you looked hard enough you could also see a small red light above the orange lights.my boyfriend went outside in the alley to get a better look and he said there was no sound.i called family members to go look in the sky but they didnt see nothing.i went to work the next day expecting to see something in the newspaper but there was nothing so i asked several of my customers if they saw any lights in the sky the night before but nobody did
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Uniontown
There were no other sightings in Uniontown on or around November 22nd 2012
